S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-438 (partial) Consolidate code around converting application character streams (Readers) to the internal stored form (modified UTF8). Pushed handling of LimitReader into ReaderToUTF8Stream to avoid duplicated code and ReaderToUTF8Stream having to make assumptions about the caller setting up the LimitReader correctly. Added comments and clarifications to LimitReader and ReaderToUTF8Stream.
